abstract: Tip from Inuit hunter leads Canadian authorities to wreck of British ship Terror, which vanished during 1848 expedition to map Northwest Passage; location of ship matches longstanding Inuit oral accounts rather than theories of modern researchers.

headline.print_headline: Doomed Arctic Explorer’s Ship Is Found
headline.main: Tip Leads to Vanished Arctic Exploration Ship After 168 Years

snippet: Scientists, researchers and the Canadian Navy and Coast Guard searched for the Terror, a British ship that vanished in 1848 while trying to map the Northwest Passage....
lead_paragraph: Scientists, researchers and the Canadian Navy and Coast Guard searched for the Terror, a British ship that vanished in 1848 while trying to map the Northwest Passage.
